techmeme.title: China published new rules last Friday banning the use of facial recognition without consent in private spaces like hotel rooms (Simon Sharwood/The Register)
A look at lobbying efforts by AI companies since Trump's return; hundreds submitted comments after a second AI-related EO, which called for pro-growth AI policy (Cecilia Kang/New York Times)
Arcade, a gen-AI marketplace for designing jewelry, raised a $25M Series A led by Canaan Partners, bringing total funding to $42M, and expands to home goods (Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch)
Sources: Haofei Wang, X's director of engineering who joined the company in July 2023, has left the company (Kylie Robison/The Verge)
Berlin-based workflow automation startup n8n raised a €55M Series B, sources say at a valuation of ~€250M, and says it has 3K+ enterprise customers (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
